text: Bogi Þorsteinsson (2 August 1918 – 17 December 1998) was the first chairman of the Icelandic Basketball Association, serving for eight years. For his work toward basketball in Iceland he was awarded the Knight's Cross of the Order of the Falcon. ==Early life== Bogi graduated as a radio operator in 1941. On 21 February 1945 he survived the sinking of SS Dettifoss by in the Irish Sea. Off the 45 crew and passengers on board, 3 passengers and 12 crew members perished. ==References== Category:1918 births Category:1998 deaths Bogi Thorsteinsson Bogi Thorsteinsson
title: Bogi Þorsteinsson
